thread.title: Cubs SS Russell ruled out for NLCS with hamstring injury
thread.title_full: Cubs SS Russell ruled out for NLCS with hamstring injury

title: Cubs SS Russell ruled out for NLCS with hamstring injury
text:
> Top News Cubs SS Russell ruled out for NLCS with hamstring injury Chicago Cubs starting pitcher Jake Arrieta waits to take batting practice during a workout in preparation for Game 1 of baseball's National League Championship Series in Chicago, Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015. (AP Photo/David Banks) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
